pages.text: The obvious follower of the Extraction Rune is the Destination Rune, an output that can reconstruct a soul from the chaos within the tears. $(#f00)Be warned,$() as it may bring some other materials along for the ride. Test it on some other creatures first. And wear safety googles.
A rune that cannot be activated, at least from this end.$(br)Try the $(l:runes/extraction)Extraction Rune.$(/l)
